headline: SpaceX Buys More EchoStar Spectrum to Boost Mobile Ambitions
summary: SpaceX agreed to buy an additional $2.6 billion in spectrum licenses from EchoStar (SATS), building on the $17 billion worth of licenses that it agreed to buy earlier this year.  The spectrum purchases give Elon Musk’s rocket and satellite-internet company an expanded foothold in the mobile-phone business.  SpaceX provides home broadband service through its Starlink business and has dipped into the mobile-phone sector through a U.S. partnership with T-Mobile.

headline: United States Telecom Operators Intelligence Report 2025 Featuring AT&T Verizon Comcast T-Mobile US Cellular CenturyLink Charter Cox Communications DirecTV Dish Network
summary: Key opportunities in the US telecom market include expanding fixed broadband in underserved areas, increasing mobile and 5G subscriptions, and leveraging IoT connections.
